data.name: BOOOOST!!!!
data.detailed_description:
Help boost Soloman to his full potential by honing his test pilot skills in this fun, sci-fi puzzle-platformer.

Key Features

  • Gameplay: Enjoy more than 100 short and challenging levels of exciting pixel-art stylized gameplay.
  • Story: Take part in an unfolding mystery.
  • Achievements: Show off your accomplishments by unlocking achievements.
  • Leaderboards: Get placed on the leaderboards to demonstrate your skills.
  • Multiplayer: Once you've mastered your piloting skills, take them online to compete with your friends!
data.about_the_game:
Help boost Soloman to his full potential by honing his test pilot skills in this fun, sci-fi puzzle-platformer.

Key Features

  • Gameplay: Enjoy more than 100 short and challenging levels of exciting pixel-art stylized gameplay.
  • Story: Take part in an unfolding mystery.
  • Achievements: Show off your accomplishments by unlocking achievements.
  • Leaderboards: Get placed on the leaderboards to demonstrate your skills.
  • Multiplayer: Once you've mastered your piloting skills, take them online to compete with your friends!
data.short_description: BOOOOST!!!! is a skill-based, sci-fi themed action platformer with some narrative driven elements and some minor puzzle elements.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 8 or higher
  • Processor: 1.6GHz or higher processor
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Graphics card with DirectX 10 capabilities and 2GB VRAM
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
  • Sound Card: 16 bit
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 (x64)
  • Processor: 2.0GHz or higher processor
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Graphics card with DirectX 10 capabilities and 4GB VRAM
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
  • Sound Card: 16 bit

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: macOS 10.13+
  • Processor: 1.6GHz or higher processor
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 2GB VRAM
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
  • Sound Card: 16 bit
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: macOS 10.13+
  • Processor: 2.0GHz or higher processor
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 4GB VRAM
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
  • Sound Card: 16 bit
